alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Lee; Owsley; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 8:16PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Owsley, Breathitt, southeastern Lee and southeastern Wolfe Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 816 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Monica to near Jetts Creek to Lucky Fork. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Monica, Primrose, Jetts Creek, Tallega and Athol around 820 PM EDT. Turkey, Canyon Falls, Vada and Copebranch around 825 PM EDT. Guerrant, Fillmore and Williba around 830 PM EDT. Widecreek, Houston, Crockettsville and Oakdale around 835 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Sebastian`s Branch, Talbert, Yeadon, Chenowee, Flat, Mary, War Creek, Canoe, Pence, Gentry, Lawson, Bethany, Hollonville, Lane, Elkatawa, Wolf Coal, Inverness, Saldee, Fivemile, Dumont, Frozen Creek, Wilhurst, Quicksand, Vancleve and Whick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
